author: Matthew Impelli
title: What Is a Wet Market? Amid Pandemic, Crackdown Is Called for on Selling Live Animals in China
description: Some have begun to call for a crackdown on China's wet markets, which are suspected of being the place the virus could have originated.
content:
Calls are coming to crack down on China's wet markets, which some suspect are the place where the coronavirus could have first infected humans.
Such markets are known for selling live animals such as cats, dogs, fish, rabbits and bats. Wet markets are named … [+2705 chars]
